Articles.Content:
The challenge is simple to say hard to do (warning need a decent computer)

the challenge is to completely cover kerbin with metal plates in a 30000 m orbit good luck send me a photo of it

Hi Ethanadams and welcome to the KSP forums

Unfortunately your challenge is not possible in the game and to save you from embarrassment, disappointment and admonishment by other members I have closed this thread.

Please see the Challenge submission guide for help on challenges, and try again when you have a challenge that is possible within the limits of current generation PC hardware
